summary: The isReplaying flag needs to be updated to reflect the current execution context in the main thread during workflow replay. This is a follow-up to PR #657 addressing how replay state is communicated.
userImpact: Users may receive incorrect isReplaying values during workflow execution, leading to unexpected behavior in replay detection logic.
rootCause: The isReplaying flag is not properly synchronized with the main thread execution state during workflow replay.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved through updates to the replay mechanism to properly track isReplaying state in the main thread context.
